short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find a tab with some search conditions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small tool to find tabs in all of your chrome windows by title and/or url pattern. When find it, you can click on the item and move it to the current chrome window. Enjoy!

Version 1.1: Add Bring All button. Thank Paul for the suggestion!!
Version 1.2: Add favicon.
